name: Five night's at Foxy's
description:
Can you survive five night's at Foxy's ?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Welcomme to your new Job in our factory.
You are here to check that everything is normal.
If something behind your right door, then press the right white button!
If they're not sure that's something behind your door then click the grey button.
This one does everything that moves for a short time visibili.
But you have limited power!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
There is also a "Pirate cove" !
The fox there like to be watcht!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THIS IS JUST A FAN GAME FROM FIVE NIGHT'S AT FREDDY'S FROM SCOTT CAWTHON !!

 
  #survival #pointnclick

#fnaf
